rules_text: This spell deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Until end of turn, That creature loses all abilities and assigns combat damage equal to its base power.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/ONogJ



OG_1:
Costed 4 mana
Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or greater. Until end of turn, that permanent’s controller can’t cast spells that share a card type with that permanent.
